articles.title: Apple in talks with Tencent, ByteDance to roll out AI features in China, sources say
articles.content: Apple is in talks with Tencent and TikTok owner ByteDance about integrating their artificial intelligence models into iPhones sold in China, according to three sources familiar with the matter. ...

articles.title: Apple hits out at Meta's numerous interoperability requests
articles.content: BRUSSELS (Reuters) -Apple on Wednesday hit out at Meta Platforms, saying its numerous requests to access the iPhone maker's software tools for its devices could impact users' privacy and security, underscoring the intense rivalry between the two tech giants.  Under the European Union's landmark Digital Markets Act that took effect last year, Apple must allow rivals and app developers to inter-operate with its own services or risk a fine of as much as 10% of its global annual turnover.  Meta has made 15 interoperability requests thus far, more than any other company, for potentially far-reaching access to Apple's technology stack, the latter said in a report.

articles.title: The top 3 features from Apple’s latest iOS update
articles.content: Apple (AAPL) has released its second wave of artificial intelligence features in iOS 18.2 across Mac, iPad, and iPhone devices. Yahoo Finance Tech Editor Dan Howley joins Asking for a Trend to demonstrate the top three new features: ChatGPT integration, Genmoji, and Visual Intelligence. Howley also explores additional capabilities, including App Intention—which enables Siri to perform specific tasks within apps—and enhanced personal content usage for improved task automation. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Asking for a Trend here. This post was written by Angel Smith

articles.title: Apple Intelligence Still Not Driving iPhone Sales. AI Upgrade Cycle Yet To Arrive.
articles.content: Apple's iPhone 16 sales are lagging last year's models possibly due to low consumer awareness of AI features.

articles.title: Nvidia stock rebounds amid bullish analyst outlooks, then falters after Fed decision
articles.content: Nvidia stock rose as Wall Street analysts reiterated their Buy ratings despite concerns about rising competition and the possibility that AI chip demand could wane.

articles.title: App downloads decline 2.3% in 2024, but consumer spending grows to $127B
articles.content: The global app economy continued to recover in 2024, after an earlier slowdown in 2022 — at least in terms of consumer spending. In 2024, global consumer spending in mobile apps and games reached $127 billion across the App Store and Google Play, up 15.7% from the prior year. However, those increases were driven by Apple's App Store, as Google Play spending declined, according to new data from app intelligence firm Appfigures. Though spending was up, there was another worrying sign about the ove

articles.title: Apple Halts Effort to Build iPhone Hardware Subscription Service

articles.title: Apple Faces Criminal Complaints, Develops Foldable iPad Amid More Than 35% YTD Gain
articles.content: The Democratic Republic of Congo has filed criminal complaints against Apple's subsidiaries in France and Belgium.
